item.title: Aspose.PDF for JavaScript via C++ Release Notes
item.description: First Public Release of Aspose.PDF for JavaScript via C++ We are pleased to announce the first public release of Aspose.PDF for JavaScript via C++. Aspose.PDF for JavaScript via C++ allows developers manipulate them PDF files directly in the Web. Developers can create high-performance and secure web applications that run directly in web browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, MS Edge). Please visit Product Page for further details and get the chance to download first release of Aspose.
